short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: quick access to a huge library of poems in 10 languages

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This little extension (only 11kb) creates a small icon in your bar that allows you to see the most recent texts on www.agonia.net and also make a quick search for any literary text on agonia.net.
